analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#40) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mint (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#387-394)
empty in ERC23PayableToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#345-347) is a local variable never initialiazed

TokenSale.finalize has external calls inside a loop:
	- contributors[x].transfer(amountToReturn) (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#575-576)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.buy (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#497-522):
	External calls:
	- tokens = getTokensAmountUnderCap(amount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#503)
	- token.mint(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#507-508)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributions (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#518-521)
	- contributors (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#517)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/38/0x521ed218348577fa2915b9454b72712024d350d2.sol#11-14): it allows old versions
